abstract: Voters in Boulder, Colo, are set to weigh in on whether to sever city's relationship with Minneapolis-based corporate utility Xcel Energy and move toward home-ruled, municipally owned power company that would be environmentally greener and locally accountable.
snippet: Facing an attempt to replace it with a municipally owned utility in Boulder, the energy company Xcel says it is better equipped to ramp up renewable energy.
lead_paragraph: Facing an attempt to replace it with a municipally owned utility in Boulder, the energy company Xcel says it is better equipped to ramp up renewable energy.

headline.main: In Colorado, a Power Struggle With the Power Company
headline.print_headline: In Colorado, a Pitched Battle to Take Back Power From the Power Company
headline.seo: Boulder Seeks to Take Power From the Power Company
